page.title: 05A SALISBURY MAN
page.content: {Mr Corkill}is the Salisbury Playhouse Theatre Manager. His training took about eighteen months. He had to visit other theatres, to learn all about them. During his training, he worked in every department, except wardrobe. He did not like the acting part of his training, but he found all the departments interesting. He came to Salisbury in 1966, and has been Manager for nine years. {Mr Corkill}is in charge of front of house, and the Director is in charge of back-stage. Fifty people work in front of house at Salisbury Playhouse. There are two theatres in the Playhouse, the Main Theatre and the Salberg Theatre. There is a loop system fitted in the main theatre for the deaf and hard of hearing.
